name: unmanipulated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having been manipulated (= changed, often unfairly or dishonestly): The newspaper was adamant that the pictures they had published were unmanipulated. Can you be absolutely certain that the data on which these conclusions are based is unmanipulated?
More examplesFewer examplesOnly unmanipulated digital images will be accepted.The recording is completely unmanipulated, so you get a very strong sense of what it must have been like to be in the concert hall.Only by examining the plain, unmanipulated truth of our history can we really hope to make progress.
